reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is amazing! Her lectures are engaging, and she really cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Prof. Kim is very knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit fast-paced. Still, he’s always available for questions.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Roberts does her best to make it understandable. Could be more organized.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Prof. Allen brings history to life! His stories make the material unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows her stuff, but her lectures are often dry and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Great professor! Clear explanations and very supportive. Labs can be tough, though.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Foster is passionate and insightful. I’ve learned so much from her class.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Decent lecturer, but the material is tough. You’ll need to study hard outside of class.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Hernandez makes a complex subject understandable. Her enthusiasm is contagious.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Lectures are a bit confusing, and the grading is harsh. Not my favorite class.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Dr. Parker is a gem! She’s encouraging and gives constructive feedback that really helps you grow as a writer.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Prof. Scott is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit dry. Study sessions are a must.

reviews.subject: Microbiology
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is thorough and passionate. Labs are intense but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Baker is engaging and makes you think critically about current events. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is good, but the material is tough. Be prepared to spend extra time on homework.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is passionate and knows his art! His classes are interesting and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is fantastic! Her love for literature is evident, and she inspires the same in her students.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Lectures are tough to follow, and the exams are even tougher. Not an easy class.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable, and her passion for the subject shows. Labs are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Psychology of Learning
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson is one of the best! His lectures are engaging, and he really cares about his students’ success.
